verses.verse: כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus הִרְאַ֙נִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> shewed אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Thus hath the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold יוֹצֵ֣ר <S%H3335><s%> unto me and behold he formed גֹּבַ֔י <S%H1462><s%> grasshoppers בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <S%H8462><s%> in the beginning עֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> of the shooting up הַלָּ֑קֶשׁ <S%H3954><s%> of the latter growth וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold לֶ֔קֶשׁ <S%H3954><s%> and lo [it was] the latter growth אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> after גִּזֵּ֥י <S%H1488><s%> mowings הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king's

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came אִם־ <S%H518><s%> when כִּלָּה֙ <S%H3615><s%> And it came to pass [that] when they had made an end לֶֽאֱכוֹל֙ <S%H398><s%> of eating אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> the grass הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> then I said אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3068><s%> GOD סְֽלַֽח־ <S%H5545><s%> forgive נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> please מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> How יָק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> arise יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> I beseech thee by whom shall Jacob כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> ? for he [is] small הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

נִחַ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> repented יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> for this It shall not be saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus הִרְאַ֙נִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> shewed אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Thus hath the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold קֹרֵ֛א <S%H7121><s%> called לָרִ֥ב <S%H7378><s%> to contend בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> by fire אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> unto me and behold the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וַתֹּ֙אכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and it devoured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> deep רַבָּ֔ה <S%H7227><s%> the great וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> and did eat up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵֽלֶק׃ <S%H2506><s%> a part

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> I O Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD חֲדַל־ <S%H2308><s%> cease נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> please מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> How יָק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> arise יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> I beseech thee by whom shall Jacob כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> ? for he [is] small הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

נִחַ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> repented יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> This לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> for this This also shall not be saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus הִרְאַ֔נִי <S%H7200><s%> Thus he shewed וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֲדֹנָ֛י <S%H136><s%> me and behold the Lord נִצָּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> upon a wall אֲנָ֑ךְ <S%H594><s%> [made] by a plumbline וּבְיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand אֲנָֽךְ׃ <S%H594><s%> with a plumbline

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> what seest עָמ֔וֹס <S%H5986><s%> unto me Amos וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> thou? And I said אֲנָ֑ךְ <S%H594><s%> A plumbline וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> the Lord הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am about שָׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> Behold I will set אֲנָךְ֙ <S%H594><s%> a plumbline בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> I will not again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again עֲב֥וֹר <S%H5674><s%> pass by לֽוֹ׃

וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> shall be desolate בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> And the high places יִשְׂחָ֔ק <S%H3446><s%> of Isaac וּמִקְדְּשֵׁ֥י <S%H4720><s%> and the sanctuaries יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יֶחֱרָ֑בוּ <S%H2717><s%> shall be laid waste וְקַמְתִּ֛י <S%H6965><s%> and I will rise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> against the house יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֲמַצְיָה֙ <S%H558><s%> Then Amaziah כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> to Jeroboam מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying קָשַׁ֨ר <S%H7194><s%> hath conspired עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against עָמ֗וֹס <S%H5986><s%> Amos בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H7130><s%> against thee in the midst בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not תוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> is not able הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לְהָכִ֖יל <S%H3557><s%> to bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <S%H1697><s%> all his words

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹה֙ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith עָמ֔וֹס <S%H5986><s%> For thus Amos בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel גָּלֹ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> shall surely יִגְלֶ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> be led away captive מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H127><s%> out of their own land ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲמַצְיָה֙ <S%H558><s%> Also Amaziah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עָמ֔וֹס <S%H5986><s%> unto Amos חֹזֶ֕ה <S%H2374><s%> O thou seer לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go בְּרַח־ <S%H1272><s%> flee thee away לְךָ֖ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וֶאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> and there eat שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> and there לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וְשָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there תִּנָּבֵֽא׃ <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy

וּבֵֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> any more at Bethel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> not again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְהִנָּבֵ֑א <S%H5012><s%> But prophesy כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> is a מִקְדַּשׁ־ <S%H4720><s%> chapel מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> for it [is] the king's ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court מַמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> and it [is] the king's הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered עָמוֹס֙ <S%H5986><s%> Amos וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲמַצְיָ֔ה <S%H558><s%> to Amaziah לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נָבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> I [was] no prophet אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> neither [was] I a prophet's אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> I כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> I am a בוֹקֵ֥ר <S%H951><s%> but I [was] an herdman אָנֹ֖כִי <S%H595><s%> and a וּבוֹלֵ֥ס <S%H1103><s%> and a gatherer שִׁקְמִֽים׃ <S%H8256><s%> of sycomore fruit

וַיִּקָּחֵ֣נִי <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> me as I followed הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> and to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> unto my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Now therefore hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> thou the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you אֹמֵ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Thou sayest לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִנָּבֵא֙ <S%H5012><s%> Prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> not against Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַטִּ֖יף <S%H5197><s%> and drop עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> not [thy word] against the house יִשְׂחָֽק׃ <S%H3446><s%> of Isaac

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִשְׁתְּךָ֞ <S%H802><s%> Thy wife בָּעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city תִּזְנֶה֙ <S%H2181><s%> shall be an harlot וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְאַדְמָתְךָ֖ <S%H127><s%> and thy land בַּחֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> by line תְּחֻלָּ֑ק <S%H2505><s%> shall be divided וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> yourself עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אֲדָמָ֤ה <S%H127><s%> land טְמֵאָה֙ <S%H2931><s%> a polluted תָּמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> and thou shalt die וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel גָּלֹ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> shall surely יִגְלֶ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> go into captivity מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H127><s%> forth of his land ס
